ViewObject.Name: HistoryApprovalView
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT Proposal.ADDENDUM_KE, Proposal.COMPANY_ID, Proposal.CONFIRM_NO, Proposal.CONTACT, Proposal.CREATED_BY, Proposal.CREATION_DATE, Proposal.CURRENCY, Proposal.CUST_REG_FLAG, Proposal.DISCOUNT_TYPE, Proposal.KOMPENSASI_DIPEROLEH, Proposal.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, Proposal.LAST_UPDATED_BY, Proposal.MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN, Proposal.NOTES, Proposal.PC_TYPE, Proposal.PEMOHON, Proposal.PERIODE_PROG_FROM, Proposal.PERIODE_PROG_TO, Proposal.PROG_DAYS, Proposal.PROG_PROMO, Proposal.PROPOSAL_DATE, Proposal.PROPOSAL_ID, Proposal.PROPOSAL_NO, Proposal.PROPOSAL_TYPE, Proposal.STATUS, Proposal.STD_STM, Proposal.USER_TYPE_CREATOR, Proposal.CONFIRM_DATE, Proposal.PR_CREATED, Proposal.COPY_SOURCE, Proposal.MODIFIER_TYPE, Proposal.BJP_FLAG, Proposal.ARCHIEVE_FLAG, Proposal.PR_REQUEST_ID, Proposal.MOD_REQUEST_ID, Proposal.HIST_REMARK, Proposal.HIST_TRAN_DT_FROM, Proposal.HIST_TRAN_DT_TO, Proposal.CATEGORY_PC, Proposal.MIX_QTY_PROMO, (SELECT FcsViewNoPr.STATUS FROM APPS.FCS_VIEW_NO_PR FcsViewNoPr WHERE FcsViewNoPr.NO_PC = Proposal.CONFIRM_NO AND FcsViewNoPr.CREATION_DATE = (SELECT MAX(NPR.CREATION_DATE) FROM APPS.FCS_VIEW_NO_PR NPR WHERE NPR.NO_PC = Proposal.CONFIRM_NO)) AS STATUS_PR_EBS, (SELECT CASE WHEN FcsViewNoModifier.ACTIVE = 'Y' THEN 'ACTIVE' WHEN FcsViewNoModifier.ACTIVE = 'N' THEN 'INACTIVE' ELSE ' TRANSFERING ' END AS MOD_STATUS FROM APPS.FCS_VIEW_NO_MODIFIER FcsViewNoModifier WHERE FcsViewNoModifier.NO_CONFIRM = DECODE(NVL(Proposal.ADDENDUM_KE,0),0,Proposal.CONFIRM_NO,Proposal.CONFIRM_NO||'-'||Proposal.ADDENDUM_KE)) AS STATUS_MOD_EBS, (SELECT MAX(NVL(PROP.ADDENDUM_KE,0)) FROM PROPOSAL PROP WHERE PROP.STATUS <> 'CANCELED' AND PROP.CONFIRM_NO = Proposal.CONFIRM_NO) AS ADDENDUM_LAST, (CASE WHEN FcsViewDcvFlag.TOTAL > 0 THEN 'DCV' ELSE NULL END) AS DCV_FLAG, (SELECT COUNT(RE.PROD_RIP_EXISTS) FROM (SELECT RIP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PP.PROPOSAL_ID, 1 AS PROD_RIP_EXISTS FROM REALISASI_ITEM_PAKET RIP, PROMO_PRODUK PP, PROPOSAL PROP WHERE RIP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND PP.PROPOSAL_ID = PROP.PROPOSAL_ID GROUP BY RIP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PP.PROPOSAL_ID HAVING (COUNT(RIP.REAL_ITEM_PAKET_ID) > 0)) RE WHERE RE.PROPOSAL_ID = Proposal.PROPOSAL_ID) AS REALISASI_ITEM_PAKET_COUNT, Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS, Proposal.EBS_MODIFIER_STATUS, (SELECT COUNT(PP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) FROM PROMO_PRODUK PP WHERE PP.PROPOSAL_ID = Proposal.PROPOSAL_ID) AS PRODUK_TOTAL_COUNT, (SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT PROP.STATUS FROM PROPOSAL PROP WHERE PROP.PROPOSAL_ID = (SELECT MAX(PPMAX.PROPOSAL_ID) FROM PROPOSAL PPMAX WHERE PPMAX.COPY_SOURCE = Proposal.PROPOSAL_NO AND ROWNUM =1)) = 'CANCELED' THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS IS_REFERENCED FROM DUAL) AS IS_REFERENCED, (SELECT MAX(NVL(PROP.ADDENDUM_KE,0)) FROM PROPOSAL PROP WHERE PROP.CONFIRM_NO = Proposal.CONFIRM_NO) AS ADDENDUM_LAST_TRX, (CASE WHEN FcsViewPreDcvFlag.TOTAL > 0 THEN 'DCV' ELSE NULL END) AS PRE_DCV_FLAG, (SELECT NVL(SUM(PPL.NUM_VIEW),0) FROM PRINT_PREV_LOG PPL WHERE PPL.PROPOSAL_ID = Proposal.PROPOSAL_ID) AS PRINT_COUNTER, Proposal.PPN_FLAG FROM PROPOSAL Proposal, FCS_VIEW_DCV_FLAG FcsViewDcvFlag, FCS_VIEW_PRE_DCV_FLAG FcsViewPreDcvFlag, DOC_APPROVAL DocApproval WHERE Proposal.PROPOSAL_ID = DocApproval.PROPOSAL_ID AND ((DocApproval.ACTION_BY = :usrName) OR (Proposal.CREATED_BY = :usrName)) AND PROPOSAL.CONFIRM_NO = FcsViewDcvFlag.NO_PC_ORI(+) AND Proposal.PROPOSAL_NO = FcsViewPreDcvFlag.NO_PP(+) GROUP BY Proposal.ADDENDUM_KE, Proposal.COMPANY_ID, Proposal.CONFIRM_NO, Proposal.CONTACT, Proposal.CREATED_BY, Proposal.CREATION_DATE, Proposal.CURRENCY, Proposal.CUST_REG_FLAG, Proposal.DISCOUNT_TYPE, Proposal.KOMPENSASI_DIPEROLEH, Proposal.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, Proposal.LAST_UPDATED_BY, Proposal.MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN, Proposal.NOTES, Proposal.PC_TYPE, Proposal.PEMOHON, Proposal.PERIODE_PROG_FROM, Proposal.PERIODE_PROG_TO, Proposal.PROG_DAYS, Proposal.PROG_PROMO, Proposal.PROPOSAL_DATE, Proposal.PROPOSAL_ID, Proposal.PROPOSAL_NO, Proposal.PROPOSAL_TYPE, Proposal.STATUS, Proposal.STD_STM, Proposal.USER_TYPE_CREATOR, Proposal.CONFIRM_DATE, Proposal.PR_CREATED, Proposal.COPY_SOURCE, Proposal.MODIFIER_TYPE, Proposal.BJP_FLAG, Proposal.ARCHIEVE_FLAG, Proposal.PR_REQUEST_ID, Proposal.MOD_REQUEST_ID, Proposal.HIST_REMARK, Proposal.HIST_TRAN_DT_FROM, Proposal.HIST_TRAN_DT_TO, Proposal.CATEGORY_PC, Proposal.MIX_QTY_PROMO, Proposal.EBS_PR_STATUS, Proposal.EBS_MODIFIER_STATUS, Proposal.PPN_FLAG, (CASE WHEN FcsViewPreDcvFlag.TOTAL > 0 THEN 'DCV' ELSE NULL END), (CASE WHEN FcsViewDcvFlag.TOTAL > 0 THEN 'DCV' ELSE NULL END)

ViewAttribute.Name: CanAddendum
StatusPrEbs
ViewAttribute.Expression: (SELECT FcsViewNoPr.STATUS FROM APPS.FCS_VIEW_NO_PR FcsViewNoPr WHERE FcsViewNoPr.NO_PC = Proposal.CONFIRM_NO AND FcsViewNoPr.CREATION_DATE = (SELECT MAX(NPR.CREATION_DATE) FROM APPS.FCS_VIEW_NO_PR NPR WHERE NPR.NO_PC = Proposal.CONFIRM_NO))

ViewAttribute.Name: StatusModEbs
ViewAttribute.Expression: (SELECT CASE WHEN FcsViewNoModifier.ACTIVE = 'Y' THEN 'ACTIVE' WHEN FcsViewNoModifier.ACTIVE = 'N' THEN 'INACTIVE' ELSE ' TRANSFERING ' END AS MOD_STATUS FROM APPS.FCS_VIEW_NO_MODIFIER FcsViewNoModifier WHERE FcsViewNoModifier.NO_CONFIRM = DECODE(NVL(Proposal.ADDENDUM_KE,0),0,Proposal.CONFIRM_NO,Proposal.CONFIRM_NO||'-'||Proposal.ADDENDUM_KE))

ViewAttribute.Name: PromoIsRun
CancelPcPr
CancelPcMod
CanCreatePr
CanCreateMod
AddendumLast
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT MAX(NVL(PROP.ADDENDUM_KE,0)) FROM PROPOSAL PROP WHERE PROP.STATUS <> 'CANCELED' AND PROP.CONFIRM_NO = Proposal.CONFIRM_NO

ViewAttribute.Name: IsAddendumLast
DcvFlag
ViewAttribute.Expression: (CASE WHEN FcsViewDcvFlag.TOTAL > 0 THEN 'DCV' ELSE NULL END)

ViewAttribute.Name: RealisasiItemPaketCount
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT COUNT(RE.PROD_RIP_EXISTS) FROM (SELECT RIP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PP.PROPOSAL_ID, 1 AS PROD_RIP_EXISTS FROM REALISASI_ITEM_PAKET RIP, PROMO_PRODUK PP, PROPOSAL PROP WHERE RIP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND PP.PROPOSAL_ID = PROP.PROPOSAL_ID GROUP BY RIP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PP.PROPOSAL_ID HAVING (COUNT(RIP.REAL_ITEM_PAKET_ID) > 0)) RE WHERE RE.PROPOSAL_ID = Proposal.PROPOSAL_ID

ViewAttribute.Name: DcvPcPrFlag
ProdukTotalCount
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT COUNT(PP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) FROM PROMO_PRODUK PP WHERE PP.PROPOSAL_ID = Proposal.PROPOSAL_ID

ViewAttribute.Name: IsReferenced
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT PROP.STATUS FROM PROPOSAL PROP WHERE PROP.PROPOSAL_ID = (SELECT MAX(PPMAX.PROPOSAL_ID) FROM PROPOSAL PPMAX WHERE PPMAX.COPY_SOURCE = Proposal.PROPOSAL_NO AND ROWNUM =1)) = 'CANCELED' THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS IS_REFERENCED FROM DUAL

ViewAttribute.Name: AddendumLastTrx
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT MAX(NVL(PROP.ADDENDUM_KE,0)) FROM PROPOSAL PROP WHERE PROP.CONFIRM_NO = Proposal.CONFIRM_NO

ViewAttribute.Name: IsAddendumLastTrx
PreDcvFlag
ViewAttribute.Expression: (CASE WHEN FcsViewPreDcvFlag.TOTAL > 0 THEN 'DCV' ELSE NULL END)

ViewAttribute.Name: PrintCounter
ViewAttribute.Expression: (SELECT NVL(SUM(PPL.NUM_VIEW),0) FROM PRINT_PREV_LOG PPL WHERE PPL.PROPOSAL_ID = Proposal.PROPOSAL_ID)
